name: Gisele Angel Squads
bio:
Our Angels are available for events and promotions, conventions, trade shows, fashion shows, lounge parties, special events nightclubs and restaurants. This girls  are energetic, positive, outgoing, sexy and sweet . They can be  the perfect marketing tool for your next event.

Angel Squads  will provide a heavenly 10 minutes relaxing experience of  head neck and shoulders while customers  socialize and party at Miami's top venues and hot spots. Although this is a new concept to Miami social scene has been running very successfully for years in other cities including London and Ibiza where we have our company set up already.  The 10-minute experience is designed to relax and energize your mind, body and spirit adding  a new dimension to an evening out!
